statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={3.3}, \displaystyle{b}={4.7}, \displaystyle{c}={5.6}, and \displaystyle{d}={8.1} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={108}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
